CustomField.description: AD-821 - hidden field to display in text the flag image
CustomField.formula: IF( Total_No_of_Actions__c = No_of_Actions_Complete__c, 'Green', IF( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Overdue')) && Total_No_of_Actions__c <> No_of_Actions_Complete__c, 'Grey', IF( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Overdue'), 'Red', NULL ) ) )
